group_1.textRight: Listen...
I want to properly hear your@side of the story.
You said you hate the school festival, but...
Why you hate it so much...
Why you caused trouble...@And why you wanted to be stopped...
I'd like to hear those things from you.
I'm also curious about your reaction when I@pointed out that your Soul Gem is cloudy...

group_1.textLeft: Ahh...it's because...the monster...@...is coming out again...

group_1.textRight: Monster...?
Here's a Grief Seed...
Yachiyo gave it to me, just in case...

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm a third year in high school...
I've just transferred to this school...because@my parents move around for work...

group_1.textRight: Right before the school festival...@Isn't that really tough...?

group_1.textLeft: ...I've changed schools a lot, so I'm used to not@fitting in...
I'm also used to not being able to participate in@events like the school festival...

group_1.textRight: ...Is that why you said you hate school festivals...?

group_1.textLeft: But...this time, I decided to be brave.

group_1.textRight: Those seeds...
...Huh? Is it not?

group_1.narration: "My magic is...@The power to create opportunities...@A seed is born that will create an opportunity@to accomplish something I want, and it'll occur@around the person or place it's planted...

group_1.textRight: So that's why there was a trail of seeds@through the new school building...?
You don't sound very certain...

group_1.textLeft: I don't know what form the opportunity@will take.
I don't even know for sure if the opportunity@will actually come...

group_1.textRight: And that's why you created so many kinds@of trouble?
That's a lot of magic...
But you said you wanted to be brave...
That means you wanted to participate in the@school festival and have fun, right?

group_1.textLeft: I saw you guys having fun, so I wanted to@have some fun too...
I know that school festivals are actually@a lot of fun...

group_1.textRight: So you didn't want to destroy it after all...

group_1.textLeft: I...I don't actually think it's fun...!

group_1.textRight: It's okay if you just want to actually have@some fun!
[chara:302400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Waaah! They're sprouting!

group_1.textLeft: When you say "school festival" and "fun"@together, they start to sprout...

group_1.textRight: Is there nothing you can do about it...?
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][se:6112_hit_slash_06_s]Then...!
It won't break...?! Is it impossible to break once it sprouts?!
"Looks like it"?! Isn't it YOUR magic...?!
Maybe...it isn't...?
[chara:100400:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]...?!
A Witch's reaction...! It's a very strong one...

group_1.textLeft: I guess this is the last bit of trouble we have to@deal with to get the school festival off the ground!

group_1.textRight: I'll go call the other Magical Girls for help...

group_1.textLeft: Umm, I'm sorry...!@I didn't mean to cause this...

group_1.textRight: Don't worry! It'll be over in a chomp!
What's with that weird saying?

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna eat the Witch's attack, and@I'm gonna eat the trouble too!
